snippet: College football message boards have become incubators for wildly absurd rumor and humor that increasingly find their way into the mainstream.
abstract: College football message boards, Web sites where users hold extended conversations about the sport and their teams, have become incubators for wildly absurd rumor and humor that increasingly find their way into mainstream discourse.
lead_paragraph: College football message boards have become incubators for wildly absurd rumor and humor that increasingly find their way into the mainstream.

headline.seo: College Football World Where L.S.U. Fans Smell Like Corn Dogs
headline.main: Anonymous and Humorous, Message Boards Feed Fans’ Passion
headline.print_headline: Anonymous and Humorous, Message Boards Feed Fans’ Passion
